EmailTemplate.name: RE: * First paying contract! (1384989032.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: * First paying contract! (1384989032.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Mike, That is awesome, little or big a project is still a project! You would sign the contract with the customer and give me the fully executed copy for our records once you have it. I made a few suggested changes based on my experience; it’s up to you if you choose to implement them. If you have any questions about my suggested changes let me know. When appropriate, please edit the email below and send to your client contact, making sure to CC me on the email as well. This information will introduce MBO Partners, provide our payment information and other documents, and instruct them to complete the “Independent Consultant Statement of Work” so that we capture your relevant project information. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks!Sara --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Dear CLIENT, Thank you for the opportunity to provide support on the upcoming/specific effort. At this point in the process, I would like to introduce you to Sara Conde, my contact at MBO Partners, Inc. MBO’s service is designed for independent consultants and small businesses that want to engage smoothly and easily with their clients. MBO takes care of my back-office administrative support, including invoicing, collecting payments, withholding taxes, insurance coverage, and much more, so that I can stay focused on providing you with the best possible service. For more information, please refer to MBO’s one-page document <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf> that explains how they work with consultants and their clients. <http://link.mbopartners.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbFVPuk5iy%2FuUI6Dh0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>As a function of this service, MBO Partners will be invoicing for and accepting payments on my behalf. To get everything fully initiated, please fill out and return the below form as soon as possible: - Independent Consultant Statement of Work <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Independent_Consultant_Statement_of_Work.pdf>– Please complete, sign, and return Additionally, the following links provide important information on MBO that you will find useful: - MBO Payment Information <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Wire_and_Payment_Information.pdf> - W-9 for MBO Partners <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_W-9.pdf> - Certificate of Liability Insurance <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Sample_COI.pdf> If you have any questions about MBO Partners you can reach out directly to Sara Conde (copied above) at 703-793-6028 or via email at sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Mike__________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Mike Davis [mailto:mike.davis.sd@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, November 20, 2013 11:32 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: * First paying contract! Sara, Still working on that BIG college support contract, but I got me a simple job NOW .... (enclosed emails refer) A research paper... fixed fee.. $2500.. he is a financial consultant... LLC... he will pay by paypal I think enclosed is the contract we will use. what else is needed? CIAO Mike On Wed, Nov 20, 2013 at 6:37 AM, Michael Kran <michael.kran@kran.com <mailto:michael.kran@kran.com>> wrote:Mike, Thanks for the leads on the two guys. I appreciate your asking them on our behalf. I am familiar with and understand the benefits of working through an umbrella organization. Would you want to be put me in contract with MBO Partners to understand their method of payment (check, wire transfer, etc.), and other mechanical procedures? I want to be prepared to follow your wishes. It sounds as though your wishes is to receive payment through them. The procedure you'd like to follow may start with getting me introduced as payor. Then I can comply with the payment method they prefer. I want to be prepared to act promptly. Best,Michael Michael D. Kran1760 Avenida del Mundo, Unit 807Coronado, CA 92118 Phone: 619-985-7175 <tel:619-985-7175> On Nov 20, 2013, at 5:51 AM, Mike Davis <mike.davis.sd@gmail.com <mailto:mike.davis.sd@gmail.com>> wrote: I know 2 guys right away that DO pen testing and development right now.. they are good and I like them Both have their own LLC.. and do independent contracts already. .. one is with "MBO Partners" as I am, they do all the taxes, withholds, etc.. act as our parent company. .. and they only charge 5% overhead... no other fees, plus it comes with professional liability insurance, etc.. great package. That's who I want to work with on our transactions too So provide the high level scope. .. I will engage David Dodds and Glenn Jacobs and see if they are interested Ciao
